document_data.name: Elephon Stoneshoulder
document_data.mainbody: '''Elephon Stoneshoulder''' was a breeder of [[horse]]s in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|20}}
document_data.Personality: He was laconic of speech, but shrewd in business.
document_data.Home: He dwelled at Northreach Farm, which of course lay north of the village.
document_data.Relations: He was related to the [[Stoneshoulder (noble family)|Stoneshoulders]], a noble family of [[Procampur]].
document_data.Activities: One of the most well-respected horse breeders of Maskyr's Eye, he produced the popular [[blackhair]] breed of equine.
